title: (17246) Sant Feliu de Guíxols -
description: Beautiful and quiet parking, without mobile home prohibition signs, in a sparse cork oak forest. Only 5km away from the Costa Brava and still far away from all the hustle and bustle of the coast. There are several pitches on partly level and partly slightly sloping ground. (Caution some thick roots). Easy access from Sant Feliu via asphalt road. The highlight is the rocking stone of Pedralta and the great view. Suitable for a picnic in the shade of the trees as well as for an undisturbed overnight stay.

We had no problems, but I imagine that during the school season, there will be more noise in the morning. it has no source of water. The only one nearby is on the other side of the road, in front of the tourist office, but when we went there, it was cordoned off.

description: On a path normally not accessible but super quiet place we were not bothered, we arrived at nightfall. A 4x4 seems to be preferable...

title: (17240) Santa Cristina de Aro - GIV-6612
description: It is a fairly flat, shaded, calm ground car park. There is no prohibition sign so we stayed there overnight and there was no problem. During the day there is just a little crowding because hikers and others stop here because there are dolmens, and dirt roads. No service.

name: Càmping Costa Brava
title: (17251) Càmping Costa Brava
description: Campsite on the Costa Brava. Family campsite and very quiet. There are few motorhome pitches because there are a lot of trees and it is difficult to maneuver. But if you have one, that's fine. It's not very big but it has the essentials: bar, swimming pool, bathrooms, showers, black drain... And tranquility. There is a small store with the essentials, but in front of the campsite there is a supermarket. Among the cheapest we have seen on the Costa Brava. In the city center, very close to everything. 10min walk from the beach.

title: (17240) Llagostera - GIV-6612
description: A nice and quiet spot on the side of a dirt road, only a few dog walkers in the morning. we stayed only 1 night.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 480 GI-682
description: Spot for one at the end of this track. Mostly level. Awesome sunrise spot and great views. Super quiet night. I preferred this over the antenna spot. No shade, obviously no services.

title: (17240) Veïnat de Ganix - GIV-6612
description: Area of land in the middle of a forest of oaks with multiple paths. The ground is a little sloping but there is an area between trees that is ideal for putting the van on a level ground. It is near a secondary road where not many cars pass: we arrived in the mid-afternoon and left in the late morning, only two cars passed. Very quiet night.

name: Càmping Pla de la Torre
title: (17252) Càmping Pla de la Torre
description:
Small, quiet and familiar campsite, there are: Modern toilets with permanent hot water. 
Grocery with essential products (bread, milk, butter, water, wine, ice cream, etc.), bar / terrace. It is located 800 m from the beach Torre Valentina (sand). 
Around 500 m you can find: 
6 supermarkets, 8 restaurants, a petrol station and 2 garages. 
All our clients can enjoy the Olympic swimming pool at Camping Internacional Palamós, located 5 km away.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 12A Carretera Blanes a Sant Feliu
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 12A Carretera Blanes a Sant Feliu
description: Viewpoint with incredible views, we have slept two vans, a motorhome and a car. The police came by and didn't say anything. Perfect place little noise at night. I will come back again.

name: Eurocamping
title: (17252) Eurocamping
description: Very pretty 4* campsite, spacious pitch, top staff. 2 very large swimming pool, beach 300 meters away, reservation recommended in season. out of season acsi card from may to end of september .

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 47 Diseminado Afueras
description: Off-road track with gravel and furrows, turning only possible at the top - about 1km long. Beautiful 360 degree view with sunrise and sunset. On foot, the village with beach in about 20 minutes away (hiking trail). Away from civilization, but close to it.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 47 Diseminado Afueras
description: Parking on the ground with a view of Tossa

title: (17240) Llagostera - Barri de Romanya de la Selva
title_short: (17240) Llagostera - Barri de Romanya de la Selva
description: Nice little parking right on the street. At night it is quiet. From here you can reach some climbing routes.

address.street: Barri de Romanya de la Selva

title: (17251) Calonge - 21 Avinguda de Sant Jordi
description: Free parking at the entrance of the town.

title: (17240) Lloc - Lloc Panedes
description: Small clearing lost among the pines and cork oaks, away from the road, access by a good track and a very short dirt road, for small size only.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Quiet place above Tossa de Mar with little sea view. Flat place on a bend in a road with very little traffic (no cars seen). In the morning some hikers and mountain bikers come by. Access via sand/gravel road with a few potholes, but definitely driveable with a van. A 4×4 is only helpful further up. Space for 1-2 cars.

title: (17251) Calonge - 53 Avinguda Catalunya
description: Public land parking with supermarkets nearby you can spend the night. Quite busy during the day.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Ramon Reig
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Ramon Reig
description: Very central Tossa de Mar, a few meters from the beach, dropping downhill, very quiet and without problem, a vehicle skipped at night passes, since the road is stuck, but at night there is no traffic, good place to sleep, in a van, a small slope, a few meters up there was a caravan in the small piece of esplanade that there was, not to camp.

title: (17251) Calonge - 31 Carrer de l'Empordà
description: Camping in a vacant lot near the beach. 5 minutes away.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 30 Avinguda Joan Maragall
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 30 Avinguda Joan Maragall
description: Paid parking from 10h to 22h, small places but one or two at the bottom of the car park, the only one to welcome us in Tossa. The free, was full

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 25 Carrer Barcelona
description: Parking possible for motorhomes in the city center.

name: Càmping Can Martí
title: (17320) Càmping Can Martí
description: Tossa de Mar, 1 Passatge Càmping C Martí. Nice campsite and close to town center and beach

title: (17252) Calonge - 4 Carrer Marítim
description: Public parking free of land, this signposted access but it is a bit difficult, overnight stay with motorhomes, but in low season there is no problem, next to the beach and the promenade, with bike lane, very quiet, no services minimum.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
description: Large car park that can accommodate about 40 vehicles to park and to visit Tossa de Mar. The beach and the historic center can be reached in 10 minutes.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 18 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 18 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Residential street next to some tennis courts. Quiet for a night, little noise after 22:00, but enough to sleep. 1.4 km from the walls, 0.5 from a supermarket, and very central. There is no prohibition sign and no one has bothered us. Normally there is always a lot of free space. Perfect for 7.5 meter AC.

title: (17251) Calonge - 2 Carrer Voramar
description: Blue Zone next to the beach with views of Palamós and Sant Antoni de Calonge from your vehicle. Little crowded out of season.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 19 Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 19 Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Large parking, lots of space we were alone in May, very pleasant to sit and eat with a view of the forest. Very good exposure for solar panels.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Creu de Mas Serra
description: Dirt road with few places to park but in August it is difficult to find free parking areas for campers

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 6 Avinguda Costa Brava
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 6 Avinguda Costa Brava
description: Self-service laundry

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 28D Avinguda de Catalunya
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 28D Avinguda de Catalunya
description: Parking near the basketball court, near the city center! Quiet night, just the squealing seagulls and at 8am the bell of the school that rings, at 9am a little music at school, the evening children come to play a little ball but not disturbing. Convenient, it can be accessed by 2 entrances

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 10 Avinguda de Ferràn Agulló
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 10 Avinguda de Ferràn Agulló
description: It is one of the widest streets, it is a blue zone that does not work in winter, ideal as it is close to everything, the only drawback is that trucks and service machinery continually pass by.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Creixams
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 Carrer Pintor Creixams
description: Laundry open 365 days

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 2 GI-681
description: Drinking water at the Bp pump

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 23 Avinguda Pelegrí
description: Public parking opposite the local police (tranquility assured) suitable for fitted van. Paying from 10h to 21h.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description: Parking next to the supermarket slat without services and very central

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Calle Vinya del Pla
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Calle Vinya del Pla
description: Perfect place without noise and accessible for all types of motorhomes.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Carrer Francesc Macià
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Carrer Francesc Macià
description: Free parking out of season, near center. Great walk. Toilet at the bus station.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 52 Carrer la Guàrdia
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 52 Carrer la Guàrdia
description: Paid parking. The night 14 e. 7 on the day. 10 min from town.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 8 Carrer Josep Irla
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 8 Carrer Josep Irla
description: Drinking water fountain, in the corner of the playground.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 1 Carrer Miramar
description: Ample parking. like many car parks in Spain if you arrive before the doorman and leave after him you will not pay anything. Shade in the motorhome area clinging to the mountain in the morning, dirt parking, sun next to the car area... Ignoring the misplaced GPS location forces you to make a detour. Follow the P1 parking instructions from Google Maps itself. You have to pass between the Skate Park and the Bus Parking to access the 1-lane road. View photos from Google Maps

title: (17230) Palamós - 15-17 Passeig del Mar
description: Drinking water from tap on the boulevard. Park up in the Car park as mentioned in another post, but go further down to the children's play park then it's 10m from there.

title: (17230) Palamós - Plaça Murada
description: Prohibition sign height greater than 2 m. WC open day and night. Excellent restaurants (Arrels) and taverns (El Galeo and Txoko) and shops but it's over for us.

name: TurisMar Camping
title: (17320) TurisMar Camping
description: You haven't hot shower??‍♀️

name: EmpordArea
title: (17230) EmpordArea
description: We are a service area for motorhomes. Open 365 days a year. We are in a fishing village on the Costa Brava. We are 1km from the beaches and coves and Les Gavarres Natural Park, 300m from Esclat supermarket and gas station, 5 minutes from Palamós town, 700m from the bars and/or restaurants, 1300m from the Tourist Office and 500m from the bus stop. The price of the place depends on the season: -  In addition we have hot showers and a washing machine (8kg) and  water changes if not staying in the area. We also sell REPSOL butane and propane bottles, 2 liter Aqua kem blue and ambiti men's and women's bottles. To book you can go to the website, write to us by email / whatsapp or call us easily.

address.street: Camí del Pla del Llop s/n - C/ Puig gorgoll s/n

title: (17230) Sant Joan de Palamós - 10 Carrer Narcís Pagès i Prats
title_short: (17230) Sant Joan de Palamós - 10 Carrer Narcís Pagès i Prats
description: Parking in front of the Palamós municipal football stadium. Right in front there is a park to walk the dog or relax on a bench. Close to shops.

title: (17230) Palamós - 1D Carrer de la Font
description: Dirt parking 10 minutes walk from the city center, spacious and quiet place to park but without trees that provide shade.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 57 Avinguda del Gironès
description: AC parking (nearby there is another in the sports center), paved access, next to a supermarket and parks next door. There are also restaurants and cafes nearby. It is not championship season, on weekends it is likely that in the morning there will be movement for basketball games.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - GI-681
description: Next to the road, but you can drive all the way to the back, then you can hardly see the camper. Only stopped here for lunch, but there are no prohibition signs - you could certainly spend a good night here on the onward journey. Unfortunately a lot of rubbish.

name: Camping Palamós
title: (17230) Camping Palamós
description:
Palamós, 12 Carretera de la Fosca. Camping Palamós, 
near beautiful beach.


Camping Palamós
Fosca 12 road,

Located above Cala Margarida and Cala dels Pots, with direct access to the sea. Pool, yakuzzi, services included.
Special prices for CamperVan.

title: (17230) Palamós - 3 Carrer d' Àngel Guimerà
description: Large dirt parking lot, we spent the quiet night there. a supermarket 5 mins walk away, and the town center just behind. Ideal for one night.

title: (17230) Palamós - 14 Ronda de l'Est
description: Quiet parking, flat ground. No services. a lot of room. To spend the night without problem. Only for mini campers of no more than 2.1 m.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 6179 Carrer Rafael Mas Ripoll
description: Free zone with filling and emptying of gray water, next to the municipal swimming pool very nice air thanks to the municipality we will come back to visit this very beautiful village. Community open WIFI.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar -
description:
Petit lieu parfait pour un van. nous étions en T6. prenez le chemin en terre et passez le tout petit ruisseau.. il y a la place pour un seul van. 
bien à l abris des regards mais encore proche de la route.. donc un peu bruyant à partir de 6h...

name: Autocaravaning Palamós SL
title: (17230) Autocaravaning Palamós SL
description: AUTOCARAVANING PALAMÓS is a service area for motorhomes. Within walking distance in 15 minutes: supermarket, city center and La Fosca beach. Connection from there to hiking trail GR92, numerous bays and beaches (Cala S'alguer, Castell and Cala Estreta, among others). There is a bus and bike path that connects to the "Petit Train" route at the entrance to the area. The prices are all inclusive, water change, electricity, WiFi (in the reception area) and toilet. Washing machine (10 kg) (with soap and fabric softener included in the price) and dryer. The pitches are terraced, compact and also suitable for heavy mobile homes. For reservations please contact by email

title: (17230) Palamós - 25D Passatge Roqueta
description: Camper park-ean egon eta gero, hurrengo egunean kanpoko parkinean aparkatu genuen SOILIK EGUNERANL izan ere badura kartelan nun loa debekatzen den, baina ondartzara joateko edota cami de ronda wgiteko leku aproposa

title: (17240) Sant Miquel d'Aro - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place in the middle of nature, it is a parking lot for hiking and mountain biking. To get there, the road is paved and winding. We went up from romanya de la Selva. Some tight passages when crossing another vehicle but it was largely doable with our 7m cc. A 3 min walk you have the Puig d'arques weather station with a 360 degree view. Magnificent sunset. No services. Space for picnicking. Ideal with a dog. Weak 4g reception. Slightly sloping ground. Passage the day of mountain biker, hiker and some motorcycles.

title: (17230) Palamós - 19 Carrer de sa Tamardia
description: Perfect parking area next to a pine forest. Perfect for spending the day next to the beach.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - 39 Diseminado Afores
description: Quiet area, we stopped to eat but we think it could be a good place to spend the night.

title: (17240) Llagostera - 16 Carrer Panedes
description: Free parking

name: Camping Internacional de Palamós
title: (17230) Camping Internacional de Palamós
description: International Camping Palamós. Good stay, very quiet in low season and with all services. Very new facilities. There are large pitches and other smaller pitches (no problem with camper and table) These pitches have an overnight rate from 7am to 10am for €17.90, €5.30 extra if you want electricity. Very close to the beach (5 minutes walk) and the center of Palamós (15 minutes walk). Swimming pool open from June to September. In the main season, at least 4 nights for €198/2 people including electricity

address.street: s/n Camí de Cap de Planes

title: (17118) - Unnamed Road
description: Flat location 10 minutes from the Ganga pass. Reserved for SUV and 4x4. Risk of being closed in summer due to fire risks

title: (17240) Llagostera - 50 Carrer de Fivaller
description: Quiet location 2 minutes from downtown. It is located near the cycle track and a park.

title: (17230) Palamós - 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa
title_short: (17230) Palamós - 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa
description: Place to go to the beach. There is no service but on the beach there are beach bars, pedal boats and showers. It is a wide, one-way street alongside a pine forest. Parking is prohibited at night.

address.street: 30 Carrer de Martí Roger i Crosa

name: Camping Cala Llevado
title: (17320) Camping Cala Llevado
description: Tossa de Mar, 10B Urbanització Cala Llevadó. Camping Cala Llevado. Entirely built on the slope but straight terrain. Clean, nice fairly upscale pool. Very beautiful beaches at the bottom 5 mins walk. For the price and the view, I recommend.

title: (17230) Palamós - 26 Passeig de la Fosca
description: Beach shower/ foot shower. not so great to fill drinking water as there is no explicit tap.

title: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Zona Càmping Tossa
title_short: (17320) Tossa de Mar - Zona Càmping Tossa
description:
Esplanade above the campsite. We came at night and were able to spend the night and have lunch the next day. It is not a dream place, but you can sleep peacefully.
Only one car passed all night.
There's too much light.

title: (17230) Palamós - 144 Carrer Sant Esteve
description: Parking on the side of the street, flat ground. Very close by a path leading to the beaches.

name: Camping Kings
title: (17230) Camping Kings
description: Camping Kings located very close to Platja de la Fosca and Cala S'Alguer.

title: (17230) Palamós - 2 Carretera Sant Esteve
description: Small roundabout with about 7 parking spaces. We did not sleep there. Next door begins a route to reach Cap Roig, passing through coves, beaches, castles, an Iberian village... Although it is quite close to residential buildings, it seems quiet.

title: (17230) Palamós - C-31
description: SUPERMARKET DAYPARKING  It is the parking of the supermarket during the day. Along the path. Next to Repsol. It is not the best car park since it has no services and is on the side of the road, but if you don't know where to park, it is a good option.

title: (17230) Palamós - C-31
description: Gas station water refill point. Correct the flow.

title: (17240) Llagostera -
description: Magnificent location very isolated in the middle of the forest (alone in the world). A magnificent view of the sea and its sunrise and on the other side a view of the mountains and its sunset. Very accessible places we went there with our heavy weight (be careful it climbs). The place can accommodate a heavy pea or two vans.

title: (17253) Vall-llobrega - 17 Calle Raval de Mar
description: Parking of sand with park for children and adults gym public washrooms with restaurants and bakery very quiet place departure for walking and bike routes.

title: (17253) Vall-llobrega - 11 Carrer Raval de Mar
description: At the entrance of a mini village. Since it is extremely difficult to find something for free here in the bypass, we test it. Bulli for four :)

title: (17230) Palamós - Carrer Sant Esteve
description: Very large beach parking lot. Walk to the cala of Saint Alguer, and to the prehistoric village then to the Callela de Pallafruguel. Barrier at 2 m during our 2nd pass, but we can park by the roadside.Night prohibited on the coast

title: (17230) Palamós - Carretera de Castell
description: Plotting land about 500mts from the beach of Castell, quiet and with some shade. Without services. In the beach, which is about 300mts, the height is limited and it is very crowded. Here much better even if you have to walk a little.

name: Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
title: (17230) Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
title_short: (17230) Camping Benelux | Platja de Castell | Costa Brava
description: Comfortable campsite 500 meters from Castel beach on the edge of the natural park.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carretera Cala Canyelles
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 2 Carretera Cala Canyelles
description: Great place right after on the beach

name: CÀMPING CANYELLES
title: (17310) CÀMPING CANYELLES
description: Camping Canyelles. Camping located on the hill of Canyelles. Pleasant ground with a beautiful view of the sea. Pool, supermarket, bar, very clean bathrooms even if a bit old. No road or city noise, the calm of the morning is really nice. A small train commutes between the high plots of the campsite and the beach, but a 5-minute walk is enough to get there. Beach very nice while the Costa Brava is armored in late July. Two nights with 2 children in tent plus electricity 99 euros. I recommend without hesitation

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 9 Avinguda Canyelles
description: Quiet location with a sandy floor. 200 meters to the beach. Restaurant on the beach

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 1 Avinguda Font de Sant Llorenç
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 1 Avinguda Font de Sant Llorenç
description: Parking spaced for all vehicles. Tarmac surface but sloping. No services on site. Plenty of room even in August. 10 min walk to the beach where you can acces showers and toilets

title: (17244) Cassà de la Selva -
description: Good place to walk and visit its beautiful forest and its paths, close to the town of Cassa de la Selva, with tables for picnics and ample parking.

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 31 Carrer Amadeu Vives
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 31 Carrer Amadeu Vives
description: A quiet place... it's a parking lot, but we spent one night since we arrived in town very late and it was the only place we could find. It is a kind of dirt parking next to a ravine, recommended for one night and very punctual.

name: Camping Relax-Nat
title: (17253) Camping Relax-Nat
description: Naturist camping (nudism is the usual way, although only obligatory in swimming pools) correct pitches, enough shade. Very good atmosphere. Multiple possibilities as a base. Also in the campsite, swimming pool, jacuzzi, tennis, paddle tennis, ballot, Basket, miniature golf and football.

title: (17253) Calella de Palafrugell - Unnamed Road
description: Asphalted and ground parking next to the Gardens of Cap Roig. Parking surrounded by nature, quiet, inside the park or protected area. there is space for motor homes.

title: (17244) Cassà de la Selva - 31 Carrer Ronda de la Sardana
title_short: (17244) Cassà de la Selva - 31 Carrer Ronda de la Sardana
description: Faucet at the playground

title: (17240) Veïnat de Mata -
description: Location to pose and sleep one night.

title: (17210) Calella de Palafrugell - 2 Passatge Cap Roig
title_short: (17210) Calella de Palafrugell - 2 Passatge Cap Roig
description: Small car park overlooking the sea on the side of the road that leads to the Jardins de Roig Natural Park. From 8 p.m. the gardens are closed, so no more traffic on the road. There is room for 2 cars/vans. Located next to an electrical shack, the electricians/people from the town hall who take care of it came by in the morning and didn't tell us anything. A bit of traffic in the morning (hikers, joggers etc) but very quiet overall.

title: (17310) -
description: Water point

title: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 24 Camí Antic de Tossa
title_short: (17310) Lloret de Mar - 24 Camí Antic de Tossa
description: Free sand parking with a few places but very well located. Without any service.

title: (17200) Mont-ras - Avinguda de la Costa Brava
title_short: (17200) Mont-ras - Avinguda de la Costa Brava
description: By passing an urbanization you arrive by a road to a very flat area, surrounded by trees perfectly ordered, there is no prohibition signs or private area.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 30 Camí Jardí Botànic
description: Online parking in a quiet area of a residential neighborhood. 20 minutes walk from the coves of Calella. Good place to park and get to know Calella de Palafrugell.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 8 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 8 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
description: Esplanada de tierra, 2km from the center of town. We have spent a quiet night, without any service.

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
description: Free parking with few spaces but very close to the beach. On Google it says free parking.

address.street: 89 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig

title: (17253) Mont-ras - 6A Carrer Mestral
description: Drinking water and parking spaces

title: (17210) Palafrugell - 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
title_short: (17210) Palafrugell - 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
description: Free parking without prohibition sign, it is in oblique battery and they have at least 6 meters. Ideal for the Ronda road. From Calella de Palafruguell to Llafranc. Perfect for AC and Camper. Best place found given the restrictions for AC and that in Llafranc it was impossible to park.

address.street: 42 Avinguda de Baldomer Gili i Roig
